item.title: How to Apply Chalkline in Parking Lot
item.description: Equipment Chalk Chalkline Checklist Gather materials Chalk line Chalk Measuring tape Straight edge Prepare the surface Clean and dry the surface Determine the line placement Measure and mark the line placement lightly with chalk Load the chalk line Open the chalk line and fill it with chalk powder Set the line Place one end of the chalk line at one end of the line you want to mark and secure it Hold the other end of the line taut and perpendicular to the ground Snap the line

item.title: SOP for painting curbing on parking lot
item.description: SOP Gather the necessary materials and equipment: Paint curbing machine or paint sprayer Paint suitable for curbing Curbing templates (if applicable) Measuring tape or ruler Stencils (if desired) Masking tape or painter’s tape Personal protective equipment (PPE) including gloves, goggles, and a mask Prepare the work area: Ensure the parking lot is clean and free from debris. Use masking tape or painter’s tape to mark the boundaries of the curbing area, if needed.
